title: Model Analyzer Configuration
description: The configuration file for the model analyzer

diseaseModel.description: Filename of the disease model in a json file.

output.description: Path + name of the output file

status.description: Path + name of the output SciDuct status file

seed.description: The seed for the random number generator (default: random seeding)

sampleSize.description: The number of samples taken for each exit state of a transmission (default: 100,000)

maxTick.description: The maximum tick considered when analyzing the model (default: 100)
